generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white lane markings, including a crosswalk and a median strip, which are typical features of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a narrow pedestrian walkway bordered by a curb and vegetation, located between the road and the buildings, which qualifies as a sidewalk.
- building: The image features two distinct residential buildings with roofs, windows, doors, and attached garages, which are clearly buildings.
- wall: A stone wall is visible along the front of the brick building and also runs along the property line of the house on the left, which are individual standing walls.
- fence: A metal fence with vertical bars is visible around the front yard of the brick building, which is a fence.
- pole: A tall, thin metal pole with a street sign attached to it is visible on the right side of the image, which is a pole.
- traffic sign: A blue rectangular street sign with white text reading "Bergstr." is mounted on the pole, which is a traffic sign.
- vegetation: There are several trees (including a young coniferous tree in front of the brick building), bushes, and climbing ivy on the buildings, which are all forms of vegetation.
- terrain: The grassy median strip in the center of the road and the patches of grass along the sidewalk are examples of terrain.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing as a pale, overcast area without leaves, which qualifies as sky.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz logo on the hood of a vehicle is visible in the foreground, indicating the presence of a car.
